Block<T> - Class in acsse.csc03a3
Represents a block within a blockchain structure, encapsulating transactions and their collective hash.
Block(String, List<Transaction<T>>) - Constructor for class acsse.csc03a3.Block
Constructs a new block with the specified previous hash and list of transactions.
Blockchain<T> - Class in acsse.csc03a3
Represents a blockchain, a decentralized and distributed digital ledger implemented as a chain of blocks, each containing transactions.
Blockchain() - Constructor for class acsse.csc03a3.Blockchain
Constructs a new Blockchain object initializing it with a genesis block.
